body: Instead of nipple training, the mc decided to develop her ears. And over the course of 2 hours, the mc is just gently touching her ears while striking conversations about stuffs they haven’t returned, and how the mc and girl’s figure/anime collection. However suddenly, she stopped talking and mc realized she is flustered. Some asmr talks later and they are off to do the do do. During which the mc found out that she was a virgin but still calling out on him for being a virgin. The girl later also confessed that she loved him. I mean her literally skipped hanging out with bff just to come visit him. Wholesome story.

Summary: the girl is the mc’s childhood friend. And for awhile mc realized how easy his childhood friend is, pleading her a little bit and she will skip hanging out with her friends. This time the mc wants to perform nipple training for her own good. Then the girl got upset knowing the mc just want to do ecchi stuff and that this bullshit is the reason why he is still a virgin. The mc pleaded recalling their old time and the girl buys it this time, letting him do one more “training”
